name: Serino - Bygone - Bygone
additionalNotes: Released at the 2022 PCA trade show in Las Vegas, Serino's Bygone cigar was "made to honor tradition" â€” specifically classic Cuban cigars from the early 20th century. A singular 5.5" x 48 size, the Bygone is a collaborative blend between Serino founder Carson Serino and Dave Imber of CigarClub.com, featuring an Ecuadorian Habano 2000 wrapper, Nicaraguan binder, and fillers from Peru and Nicaragua, and it's just the second Serino cigar to include Peruvian fillers after the tabacalera's 2021 release of the Elenor Rose line.
